text:
Fixed domain to lower case as per 3.4.1.2.
Added support for extracting query parameters as per 3.4.1.3.1.
The parameters does not have to be unique, thus I have modified for use of a list of tuples instead of a dictionary
The parameters were escaped one time to much, removed.
Both client and access secret can be empty, not only access. Per 3.4.2.
Added a few tests based on the RFC and http://hueniverse.com/oauth/guide/authentication/

Please comment if there is anything that is wrong or you don't like about the code.
title: Created a few tests and modified oauth.py a bit

text: Created a new pull requests since I cant figure out how to update this one. Closing.

ib, to update this one, just push more commits to the same branch this one was based on (`fcd0d5a`). Looks like you're using a git ref instead of a real branch though, so I can understand the confusion ;)
Ah okay, ill look into that and update my other pull request when the time comes =)
Fixed a few bugs in oauth.py, added 100% test coverage
